name: Who Created Us - Islamic life
description:
Who Created Us ??

Developed by : Nadim Fathi Aride

نديم فتحي عريدي

The simple Life - Simulator game .

* Important : DON'T forget to download the instructions file.

Game content :

Cut trees, Stones ,Build wood and stone cubes , build a place to worship god.

sins counter , Goods counter (virtues).

Water to drink , Eat food .

Days counter .

Day and night cycle.

3 maps to play in, and more...
